LanguageData.DMS_RangeFinder.label: Recon Calibration
LanguageData.DMS_RangeFinder.description: Share fire control data with friendly forces within range to improve squad accuracy for short period.
LanguageData.DMS_SharpShooting.label: Precision Marksmanship
LanguageData.DMS_SharpShooting.description: The mech uses its built-in ballistic calculator to adjust for the conditions of its environment, greatly improving accuracy for a short time.
